project_abstract.cdata: The main objectives of the Third Basic Education Project are to: 1) support the attainment of universal primary education and the expansion of coverage of lower secondary education in poor and minority areas; and 2) build stronger institutions responsible for education delivery. The project will support the government's efforts to make primary education universal by the year 2000 by putting more educational inputs into teaching points, increasing the enrollment in complete schools, expanding multigrade and multisubject teaching in rural areas, and reducing dropouts rates of minority children through improved bilingual educational programs. The project consists of the following components: 1) an institutional component comprising: (a) facilities upgrading; (b) instructional equipment, furniture and books; and (c) staff upgrading; 2) a management improvement component including: (a) local education management training; (b) project management training; and (c) expansion of education management information system; and 3) a central component consisting of: (a) national training; (b) research dissemination program; (c) stipend program; (d) study tours; (e) experts panel; and (f) studies.

P036950.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>第三贫困省教育发展项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的主要目标是：（1）为贫困和少数民族地区实现普及教育、扩大初中教育覆盖面提供支持；（2）组建更得力的机构负责提供教育服务。本项目将支持中国政府努力在2000年之前实现普及初等教育目标，为此将加大对教学点的教育投入力度，提高完全学校招生率，扩大农村地区的多年级和多科目教学规模，通过改进后的双语教学课程降低少数民族儿童辍学率。本项目设有下列子项目：（1）机构子项目，包括以下内容：①设施升级改造；②提供教学设备、桌椅板凳和教材；③提升教员能力；（2）管理改进子项目，包括以下内容：①地方教育管理培训；②项目管理培训；③教育管理信息系统扩建；（3）中央子项目，包括以下内容：①国家级培训；②研究成果传播；③提供助学金；④考察；⑤专家组；⑥研究。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
